SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM , NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM , NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM , PUOFER_ANTY , PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM , MLTYM_ANTY , MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM , PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY , PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY , SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE160406 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
